entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Snow level 1300 metres lowering to valley bottom overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Snow level rising to 1800 metres in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 near noon. High 12. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Snow level lowering to 900 metres overnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late in the evening. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 8 April 2023
